snippet: The House on Thursday overwhelmingly passed a bill protecting technology companies and their customers from nuisance patent-infringement lawsuits.
abstract: House overwhelmingly passes bill protecting technology companies and their customers from nuisance patent-infringement lawsuits by shell companies that exist merely to gather dormant patents and threaten lawsuits against suspected violators.
lead_paragraph: The House on Thursday overwhelmingly passed a bill protecting technology companies and their customers from nuisance patent-infringement lawsuits.

headline.main: House Bill Raises Bar for Suits Over Patents
headline.print_headline: House Bill Raises Bar For Suits Over Patents
